    • Method Detail

      • signature

        public java.lang.String signature()
        Returns a string of digits that uniquely identifies this atom. String is formed by concatenating the ordinal of this atom to the signature given by the parent of this atom. If atom has no parent, forms a string from only the ordinal.

      • toString

        public final java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string formed by concatenating the signature of this atom to a string that identifies it as a molecule.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • addChildAtom

        public void addChildAtom(IAtom newChildAtom)
        Adds the given Atom as a child of this Atom. The given child Atom should be parentless when this method is called.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given atom already has a parent.

      • removeChildAtom

        public void removeChildAtom(IAtom oldChildAtom)
        Removes the given child Atom from this AtomGroup.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given atom is not a child.
